mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_member (member_id, password, company_nm, region, city, post_cd, address, address_detail, store, member_nm, position, email, contact, accept_yn, create_dt) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{companyNm}, #{region}, #{city}, #{postCd}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{store}, #{memberNm}, #{position}, #{email}, #{contact}, (SELECT member_accept FROM tb_policy), current_timestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT member_id FROM tb_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} UNION SELECT member_id FROM tb_deleted_account WHERE member_id = #{memberId}) as member
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT email FROM tb_member WHERE email = #{email} UNION SELECT email FROM tb_deleted_account WHERE email = #{email}) as member
SELECT email, region FROM tb_member WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_member SET company_nm = #{companyNm}, post_cd = #{postCd}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, store = #{store}, member_nm = #{memberNm}, position = #{position}, email = #{email}, contact = #{contact}, update_dt = current_timestamp WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
